Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.event

Class Summary
AbstractEventHandler<T extends EventHandler>  
ChartDblClickHandler Handles the event where the user double-clicks on the chart.
ChartKeyDownHandler Handles the event where the user depresses a key.
ChartKeyPressHandler Handles the event where a character is generated from a key press (either directory or through auto-repeat).
ChartKeyUpHandler Handles the event where the user releases a key
ChartMouseClickHandler Handles the event where the user clicks on the chart.
ChartMouseDownHandler Handles the event where the user depresses a mouse button.
ChartMouseMoveHandler Handles the event where the mouse is moved within the chart area.
ChartMouseOutHandler Handles the event where the mouse if moved outside the chart area.
ChartMouseOverHandler Handles the event where mouse is moved into the chart area.
ChartMouseUpHandler Handles the event where the user releases the mouse button.
ChartMouseWheelHandler Handles the event where the user scrolls the mouse wheel.
ChartState  
CompoundUIAction Represents a logical UI action whose completion requires 2 or more atomic UI actions, as well has having distinct start and end states.
OverviewAxisMouseMoveHandler
